vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Kimley-Horn and Associates, Inc. through an Interlocal Agreement with the City of Addison to conduct Phase II of the Americans with Disabilities Act Self Evaluation and Transition Plan, which includes the development of the Sidewalk Master Plan; and extend the term of the contract for an additional six-months from the original professional services contract - Not to exceed $180,000.00, from $276,000.00 to $456,000.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Kimley-Horn and Associates, Inc. through an Interlocal Agreement with the City of Addison to conduct Phase II of the Americans with Disabilities Act Self Evaluation and Transition Plan, which includes the development of the Sidewalk Master Plan; and extend the term of the contract for an additional six-months from the original professional services contract - Not to exceed $180,000.00, from $276,000.00 to $456,000.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to appropriations)
